video.title: About a Boy
video.synopsis: An immature man is amazed when his new neighbors -- a ditzy single mom and her odd 11-year-old son -- awaken unexpected feelings of responsibility.

episodes.synopsis: After writing a hit song, Will Freeman is set for life, but his perfect world is turned upside down when Fiona and her son Marcus move in next door.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Will agrees to baby-sit Marcus, but he faces a dilemma when he and Andy get an invitation to rap star Lil Jon's pool party.
episodes.title: About Total Exuberance

episodes.synopsis: Will tries hard to get a much-needed guys' night out, but complications arise. Andy and his wife, Laurie, ask Will to be their son's godfather.
episodes.title: About a Godfather

episodes.synopsis: Marcus seeks Will's advice on how to get invited to a girl's birthday party, but things don't work out as anyone hoped.
episodes.title: About a Girl

episodes.synopsis: Marcus hints that Fiona and Will should date, but on the advice of her friend Dakota, Fiona asks out her plumber.
episodes.title: About a Plumber

episodes.synopsis: When Will takes Marcus to the emergency room for a cut, he meets a beautiful doctor he'll do anything to impress, even if it means bending the truth.
episodes.title: About a Bublé

episodes.synopsis: Fiona crashes Will's poker night with the guys, while Marcus has trouble fitting in during his first sleepover.
episodes.title: About a Poker Night

episodes.synopsis: Marcus gets upset when Fiona assigns him the job of slopmaster (garbage man) in a school project, and Will goes all out to impress Sam.
episodes.title: About a Slopmaster

episodes.synopsis: Game Night turns out to be anything but fun and games for Will, and Marcus feels uneasy about his new baby sitter.
episodes.title: About a Kiss

episodes.synopsis: When his dad comes to town, Marcus is thrilled, while Sam's work schedule gets in the way of her and Will's romance.
episodes.title: About a Boy's Dad

episodes.synopsis: Will is asked to help organize Marcus's birthday party, but it lands on the same day as Sam's big hospital gala.
episodes.title: About a Birthday Surprise

episodes.synopsis: Sam is evacuated from her apartment and stays with Will, but that might only be the start of big changes to come.
episodes.title: About a Hammer

episodes.synopsis: When Sam asks Will to move to New York with her, Will has a major decision to make that could end his relationship with Marcus.
episodes.title: About a Rib Chute

episodes.synopsis: Will learns that someone is claiming to have co-written one of his songs. Meanwhile, Marcus starts hanging out with some tough new "friends."
episodes.title: About a Vasectomy

episodes.synopsis: Will considers selling his house to get out of debt and tries to help Marcus find a new friend. Meanwhile, Fiona takes on a home improvement project.
episodes.title: About a House for Sale

episodes.synopsis: At Will's big annual Halloween bash, Fiona goes on a sugar binge and falls for an English guest dressed as Sherlock Holmes.
episodes.title: About a Will-O-Ween

episodes.synopsis: Fiona bans Marcus from seeing Shea, a girl he likes who's a bad influence, but can't depend on Will to enforce her wishes.
episodes.title: About a Bad Girl

episodes.synopsis: Will learns the identity of the person who's been suing him for royalties. Meanwhile, Marcus himself is accused of stalking Shea.
episodes.title: About an Angry Ex

episodes.synopsis: Marcus idolizes his new teacher, Mr. Chris, but Fiona doesn't like the man's teaching methods and Will's just plain jealous.
episodes.title: About a Balcony

episodes.synopsis: Will and Fiona try to sabotage each other's enjoyment while on a hiking double date. Meanwhile, Marcus accidentally spills some secrets to Laurie.
episodes.title: About a Duck

episodes.synopsis: Will's bitterness over Christmas seems to be spreading, as he drags Marcus on a personal mission and then manages to ruin Santa for him.
episodes.title: About a Christmas Carol

episodes.synopsis: Will and Marcus celebrate a year as bros at a music festival and meet Marcus's crush, Lisa Loeb. Meanwhile, Fiona heats things up with Mr. Chris.
episodes.title: About a Manniversary

episodes.synopsis: Will crashes a bar mitzvah in hopes of getting his music heard by a producer, and Shea and Marcus create mayhem when they're left on their own.
episodes.title: About a Boy Becoming a Man

episodes.synopsis: Chafing at his mother's relationship with Mr. Chris, Marcus moves in with Will. Meanwhile, Will looks for a song idea to sell to Johnny Idalis.
episodes.title: About a Hook

episodes.synopsis: Will starts giving guitar lessons, but fears he's becoming a prostitute when one student's mother overpays him after a one-night stand.
episodes.title: About a Prostitute

episodes.synopsis: While Will searches desperately for a date for Valentine's Day, Marcus tries to change Shea's negative opinion of the holiday.
episodes.title: About a Cat Party

episodes.synopsis: Will chaperones Marcus on his first official date with Shea. Meanwhile, Fiona gets arrested for skinny dipping with Mr. Chris.
episodes.title: About a Boyfriend

episodes.synopsis: Will comes to believe that Mr. Chris is cheating on Fiona just as she decides to take her relationship with him to the next level.
episodes.title: About a Trunk

episodes.synopsis: Will takes a one-day break from his relationship with Liz the bartender to help Fiona cope with her breakup with Mr. Chris.
episodes.title: About a Memory Hole

episodes.synopsis: Will and Fiona try to bring Andy and Laurie back together when they take separate vacations after a fight; Marcus seeks advice from a romance novel.
episodes.title: About a Babymoon

episodes.synopsis: Will's romance with Liz intensifies, but he's still reluctant to commit. Meanwhile, Fiona and Marcus try to repair Andy and Laurie's relationship.
episodes.title: About Another Boy

episodes.synopsis: Will grows uncomfortable with Liz's growing friendship with Fiona. Meanwhile, Marcus fears that Shea's falling in love with Liz's son Clay.
episodes.title: About a Self Defense

episodes.synopsis: Fiona and Will can't agree on how to help Marcus deal with his breakup with Shea. Meanwhile, Marcus has a plan to win her back.
episodes.title: About a Love in the Air
